text: Guðni Thorlacius Jóhannesson (born June 26, 1968) is an independent politician who was the President of Iceland. He became president on August 1 2016. His term ended on August 1, 2024. Guðni holds a PhD in history from Queen Mary University of London. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Iceland Category:Politicians from Reykjavík
title: Guðni Th. Jóhannesson
